name: difference_0
instruction: Choose the differences between a broom and a mop.

name: difference0
instruction: Choose the differences between a book and a sign.

instances.input:
A) Only a sign is made of paper	B) A book is always bigger than a sign	C) A book is made of many pieces of paper
D) A sign takes longer to read than a book	E) There's no difference between a sign and a book
instances.output: C) A book is made of many pieces of paper

name: difference1
instruction: Choose the differences between a broom and a mop.

instances.input:
A) Only a broom can sweep while a mop only mops	B) A mop can only clean dry	C) A broom can only clean the walls
D) There's no difference between a broom and mop	E) Only a mop can clean from side-to-side
instances.output: A) Only a broom can sweep while a mop only mops

name: difference2
instruction: Choose the differences between a television and a computer.

instances.input:
A) There is no difference between a television and a computer	B) Only a television has a screen	C) A television is used to play videos and a computer is used for many different tasks
D) A computer is bigger than a televsion	E) The television and computer can't be used at the same time
instances.output: C) A television is used to play videos and a computer is used for many different tasks

name: difference3
instruction: Choose the differences between a headlight and a taillight

instances.input:
A) There is no difference between a headlight and a taillight	B) A taillinght illuminates the back while a headlight illuminates the front	C) Both a headlight and a taillight are only used on bicycles
D) Headlights are not as bright as taillights	E) A taillight is not as necessary as a headlight
instances.output: B) A taillinght illuminates the back while a headlight illuminates the front

name: diff_criteria0
instruction: Choose the differences between a coat and an apron in terms of when theyre used.

instances.input:
A) A coat and an apron have no differences	B) A coat can only be used in the kitchen	C) An apron can only be worn outside
D) A coat can be used to keep yourself warm and an apron can be used to protect your clothing while baking	E) A coat and an apron can only be worn together
instances.output: D) A coat can be used to keep yourself warm and an apron can be used to protect your clothing while baking

name: diff_criteria1
instruction: Choose the differences between curtains and shutters in terms of how they are used.

instances.input:
A) Curtains are able to open from side to side while shutters are able to open up or down	B) Curtains can only be opened from the bottom	C) Curtains and shutters have no differences in the way theyre used
D) Shutters are always meant to stay open	E) Shutters are only able to be pulled open
instances.output: A) Curtains are able to open from side to side while shutters are able to open up or down

name: diff_criteria2
instruction: Choose the differences between an extinguisher and a hydrant in terms of how theyre used

instances.input:
A) An extinguisher can only be used for big fires	B) A hydrant puts out fires with water while an extinguisher puts out fires with chemicals	C) Anyone can easily use a hydrant to put out a fire
D) There are no differences between a hydrant and an extinguisher	E) Only extinguishers can be used by firefighters
instances.output: B) A hydrant puts out fires with water while an extinguisher puts out fires with chemicals

name: diff_criteria3
instruction: Choose the differences between a truck and a boat

instances.input:
A) A truck and a boat have no differences.	B) A truck is only driven on the water	C) A boat only gets gas
D) A truck is driven on land while a boat is driven on water	E) A boat and truck can drive on the same terrain
instances.output: D) A truck is driven on land while a boat is driven on water
